text: Hey gus, one short question: Would i regret it if i change the theme of our 19 landingpages? I'm not totally happy with our current design and would like to change that. What exactly happens, if i do that?

Hi Tobias - if you change the theme of the landing pages, it won't overwrite existing content.

If you want to change the design, the best option would be to rebuild the pages using your preferred theme and then replace them with the same URL.

You can either do this via Content Staging or manually through the editor.
